name: Project windless
description:
A fantasy adventure game based on the best-selling novel The Bird That Drinks Tears.

This ambitious project will bring the beloved book to life, showcasing its rich world, complex characters, strange creatures, and breathtaking locations.

Project Windless will bring the beloved book to life; showcasing the novel's rich world, complex characters, and breathtaking locations -- all combined with the edge-of-your-seat gameplay Krafton is known for.
